column3: et nōmen sanctum tuum invocātum est super nōs; nē dērelinquās nos
column8: and thy name is called upon by us: forsake us not

column1: $R Deō grātiās. ^ Thanks be to God.

column5: as the apple of thine eye.

column1: $R Sub umbra ālārum tuārum prōtege nōs. ^ Protect us under the shadow of thy wings.
